plot: It's Saturday night in a beach side suburb. Best friends Simone and Michelle navigate another night of surf parties, boredom and boys. By morning and everything and nothing has changed
title: Smile for Me
plot_es: It's Saturday night in a beach side suburb. Best friends Simone and Michelle navigate another night of surf parties, boredom and boys. By morning and everything and nothing has changed
